page.title: 10Post Office
page.content: The post office is situated on the main Kirkwall/Stromness road and has been operated from the same site since l947 by Mrs.Jean Muir. It caters primarily for the parish but because of its position on the main road it gets quite a lot of passing trade.About 40 customers on average pass through the post office each day. By far the busiest day is Thursday, not only because it is on this day that the senior citizens collect their pension but also because it is 'Orcadian Day' that is the day on which the Orkney newspaper is on sale! A small amount of hand-sorting goes on in the Post Office into mail for the Kirkwall and mail for the Stromness area. Like most small post offices, Mrs.Muir sells stationery, hardware, sweets and postcards.
